INKCAZELO:

Abaphathi beSebe loPhuhliso lweMizi-mveliso banceda amashishini ekufikeleleni kulwazi oluphathelelene kwiinkqubo zesizwe zenkxaso.

Ezinye zezi nkxaso ziquka i-:

* I-Export Marketing & Investment Assistance Scheme (iEMIA)
* I-neForeign Investment Grant (FIG).
Abaphathi kwakhona banikezela ngolwazi mayela neenzuzo zophuhliso ngobuchule.
